name: places/ChIJ6bsWdCdawokR38IEq5GTkE0

displayName.text: Artistic Creation Hair Salon 星髪

formattedAddress: 6 1/2 Elizabeth St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 6 1/2 Elizabeth St, New York, NY 10013-4802, USA

originalText.text:
I don't have the best photo to show you how amazing my hair looks, but I promise you, AC hair salon will exceed your expectations. I don't trust anyone else with my color and my haircut.  Chris is true master of his craft. No matter what kind of hair or how messed up your color is from your old stylist, he can make you look like a million bucks.
If you want the best foilayage, balayage, haircut, wash and style, whatever you want, he is the best to do it!
You MUST go to him. 100/10 would recommend!

originalText.text: I have been coming here for over 10 years to see Tony. He is absolutely wonderful in his craft and makes my hairstyle idea into reality. Tony and the staff here are all wonderful, sweet and personable. I will highly recommend this place to others that want a sophisticated hairstyle with an amazing service!

text.text: I have been coming here for over 10 years to see Tony. He is absolutely wonderful in his craft and makes my hairstyle idea into reality. Tony and the staff here are all wonderful, sweet and personable. I will highly recommend this place to others that want a sophisticated hairstyle with an amazing service!

originalText.text: Chris gave me one of the best haircuts of my life! $50 for a super detailed cut, wash with an amazing head massage, and a super cute blowout. Could not recommend more.

text.text: Chris gave me one of the best haircuts of my life! $50 for a super detailed cut, wash with an amazing head massage, and a super cute blowout. Could not recommend more.

originalText.text: Employees are very friendly! Love the hair wash and haircuts are always very good and exactly how I want them, even better. Definitely recommend  :)

text.text: Employees are very friendly! Love the hair wash and haircuts are always very good and exactly how I want them, even better. Definitely recommend  :)

originalText.text: I consistently go to Tony for my cuts. It has actually been years, crazy enough. They always have really good business it seems, so maybe call ahead of time if you’re not already in the area. He is the most experienced and owns the shop so that should tell you enough. But, it seems like everyone does an amazing job and has their own specialty. They have hairdressers of all ages and styles, so it seems like you can find someone that suits your liking. It’s a Chinese/Asian hair salon in Chinatown, NYC so their clientele is primarily Asian but I’ve seen other races who have similar hair textures come in for services. They speak English, so that’s a plus. The prices are very affordable compared to the rest of the city but they still do a quality job. I had my hair bleached, washed, colored, washed again, cut, and blown out. Well, worth it. Plus, I got a got to watch Netflix on the LG OLED TV that Tony is so proud of haha.
